column1: Kata Robata////I enjoyed the various rolls I ordered (particularly enjoyed the salmon and soft shell crab roll
column4: but really disliked Kata Robata's twist on seaweed salad. It's very different from the run-of-the-mill seaweed salad
column6: for the worse. It felt very "stringy." While some of the entree items intrigued me (i.e. hot rocks)
column7: I would rather go to Uchi for the same item for the same price
